scripts.pwa:analyze: npm run build && npx lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --preset=desktop --chrome-flags='--headless' --output=html --output-path=./lighthouse-report.html
scripts.pwa:test: npm run build && npm run start & sleep 5 && curl -f http://localhost:3000/manifest.json && curl -f http://localhost:3000/sw.js && echo 'PWA files accessible!'
scripts.icons:generate: echo 'Use the iconGenerator.js utility or online tools to create PWA icons'
